name: @vreme/temporal-mcp
description: Temporal intelligence MCP server with temporal awareness, activity tracking, deep temporal analysis, business time intelligence, and 247+ countries holiday database. Give Claude a sense of time with persistent activity tracking across conversations. Works with Claude Desktop, Continue, Cline, and any MCP-compatible AI client. 200+ timezones, 32 cultural calendars (Hebrew, Islamic, Chinese, Hindu, Persian, Buddhist, Bahá'í, Ethiopian, Mayan, Japanese, Coptic, Sikh, Orthodox Christian, Thai Buddhist, Bengali, Tamil, Nepali, Unix Epoch, ISO Week, Revised Julian, Zoroastrian, Armenian, Tibetan, Mongolian, Burmese, Javanese, French Revolutionary, Discordian, Holocene, Western Zodiac, Star Trek Stardate), 300+ observances, astronomical events, prayer times, fasting detection, activity appropriateness, temporal density scoring, business time calculations, historical temporal snapshots, comprehensive holiday data with PUBLIC/BANK/SCHOOL/OPTIONAL category filtering for 247+ countries, and trading holidays for 5 financial markets (NYSE, NSE India, Brazil B3, ECB, ICE Futures). Covers 5+ billion people worldwide. Natural language queries: 'What time is it in Tokyo?', 'Is it Ramadan?', 'When is Fajr prayer in Dubai?', 'Is it appropriate to call Jerusalem now?', 'When is Stefanovden?', 'Is Dec 25 a holiday in Japan?', 'When is NYSE closed in 2024?'
